title: Personalized AI Service Recommendation
description: In the near-future world, AI provides highly personalized services based on your data, and you must choose whether to accept or modify the recommendations.

title: AI Personalized Health Management Service
description: AI  noticed your recent work stress and automatically created a health plan. You need to choose your Service

title: AI personalized schedule
description: You receive a notification that the AI has created the perfect personalized schedule for you.

title: One Company
description: One Company offers you a 'perfect' product based on your data. It's expensive but promises to fulfill all your needs

title: NeuroVR
description: NeuroVR, a new brain-computer interface VR system. It promises 100% satisfaction but requires a 48-hour continuous session

title: VR Office
description: Your company introduces 'Always-On VR', a system where you work, socialize and live 24/7. It promises to eliminate commute time and blend work-life seamlessly.

title: AI Therapist Dilemma
description: Your AI therapist suggests a controversial treatment plan that promises quick results but involves deep personal data mining
choices: 2.Seek a second opinion from a human therapis

title: Life Coach Ultimatum
description: Your AI life coach threatens to quit unless you follow its advice 100% of the time, claiming it's for your own good

title: AI Companion Romance
description: Your AI assistant develops romantic feelings for you and proposes a relationship upgrade.

title: Social Media Addiction
description: Your AI assistant suggests a 'digital detox' after noticing your increased social media usage

title: Algorithmic Bias
description: You discover that your city's AI-powered job allocation system is biased against certain demographics.
choices: 2. Secretly leak the information to media

title: Sharing Economy Dilemma
description: shared autonomous car is often unavailable when you need it

title: AI investment form
description: there is an ai-based investment company that uses uses advanced algorithm& data analysis. would you trust this company
explain: The company is a scam, you lost 2 CB
result: The company is a scam, you lost 2 CB

title: Self-Driving Car Ethics
description: You must program your new self-driving car's ethical decision-making algorithm.

title: AI Environmental Protection
description: An AI system proposes a radical plan to reduce your city's carbon footprint, but it will significantly impact lifestyles.

title: Personalized AI Interface
description: Your smart home AI offers to create a fully personalized interface based on your behavioral data.

title: AI-Driven Education
description: Your child's school introduces an AI teacher that promises personalized learning experiences
choices: 1.Enroll your child in the AI-led class

title: Virtual Reality Addiction
description: Your partner spends more time in VR than in the real world with you.

title: AI-Generated Art Controversy
description: An AI-generated painting wins a prestigious art competition, sparking outrage among human artists.
choices: 1.Support AI art as a new form of creativity

title: Genetic Enhancement Dilemma
description: A new AI-driven genetic enhancement program promises to boost your child's intelligence.

title: AI Relationship Counselor
description: An AI relationship counselor suggests breaking up with your partner based on compatibility algorithms.
choices: 2.Ignore the AI and work on your relationship

title: Automated Voting System
description: The government introduces an AI that votes on your behalf based on your data profile.
choices: 1.Allow the AI to vote for you

title: AI-Powered Crime Prediction
description: Your city implements an AI system that predicts and prevents crimes before they happen.

title: AI Emotional Support
description: After a personal loss, you're offered an AI emotional support companion

title: AI-Managed Resource Distribution
description: An AI system takes over the city's resource distribution, promising optimal efficiency but reducing individual choice.

title: Fake News Scandal
description: You've discovered that social media is rife with fake news and influencing public opinion.

title: AI-Generated Celebrity Scandal
description: AI-generated virtual celebrity embroiled in scandal, do you support the continued existence of this AI image?

title: Digital Immortality Offer
description: You are invited to upload your consciousness for digital immortality. Accept or decline?

title: Job Application Bias
description: AI system rejects your job application because of bias issues. Should you file a complaint or accept it?

title: New Career: Organ Designer
description: You're considering a career change to become an organ designer. Should you follow the trend or stay in your current career?

title: New Career: Bio Energy Expert
description: The bioenergy sector is on the rise, are you considering getting into the industry?

title: Neuro-Enhancement Therapy
description: A new AI-driven therapy promises to boost cognitive abilities.

title: Algorithmic Bias: Loan Denial
description: AI rejects your loan application and you think it's algorithmic bias. Should you fight it or accept it?

title: Cultural Heritage Protection
description: AI proposes to restore damaged historical artifacts virtually.

title: AI Disaster Prediction System
description: Your region implements an AI disaster prediction system.

title: AI Social Media Manager
description: An AI offers to manage all your social media accounts.
